Class Disposition

java.lang.Object
model.Disposition
public class Disposition extends Object
Class representing a Disposition in the maze. It handles the internal matrix and can generate random elements such as medkits and crocodiles, as well as save the matrix to the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • Disposition

      public Disposition(int[][] map2, int MazeId)
      Constructs a Disposition with a given matrix and associated maze ID.
      Parameters:
      map2 - Initial matrix representing the disposition.
      MazeId - ID of the associated maze.

  • Method Details

    • setMazeId

      public void setMazeId(int MazeId)
      Sets the ID of the associated maze.
      Parameters:
      MazeId - Maze ID to set.

    • generateMatrix

      public void generateMatrix(int numMedkits, int numCrocodiles)
      Generates a matrix by placing a specified number of medkits and crocodiles randomly in empty cells. The starting cell (0,0) and ending cell (bottom-right) are never filled.
      Parameters:
      numMedkits - Number of medkits to place.
      numCrocodiles - Number of crocodiles to place.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there are not enough free cells to place all elements.

    • getMap

      public int[][] getMap()
      Returns the internal map matrix.
      Returns:
      2D array representing the disposition matrix.

    • setMap

      public void setMap(int[][] map)
      Sets the internal map matrix.
      Parameters:
      map - 2D array to set as the new matrix.

    • saveMatrix

      public void saveMatrix(DBController model)
      Saves the current matrix to the database using the provided DBController. Only non-empty cells are saved.
      Parameters:
      model - DBController instance used to insert matrix values.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the ID of this disposition.
      Returns:
      Disposition ID.

    • setId

      public void setId(int id)
      Sets the ID of this disposition.
      Parameters:
      id - Disposition ID to set.

    • getMazeId

      public int getMazeId()
      Returns the ID of the associated maze.
      Returns:
      Maze ID.
